verse: The entrance of Your word gives light.
prayer: Lord, ignite my spirit with revelation and fire.

verse: Not by might, nor by power, but by My Spirit.
prayer: Holy Spirit, take full control today.

verse: Our God is a consuming fire.
prayer: Let every impurity be burned away by Your fire.

verse: He shall give His angels charge over you.
prayer: Lord, surround me with divine protection this day.
